Banner.Title:
Simple &
Hassle-Free
Digital Payment
Banner.Description: Empowering you with personalized financial solutions.

Section 2.Title: Get on board with us
Section 2.Description: We understand the importance of a smooth and efficient onboarding process. That’s why we’ve developed a comprehensive digital onboarding program designed to get you up to speed quickly and comfortably.

Section 3.Title: We've got you covered worldwide
Section 3.Description: Send, receive and request money whenever and wherever you are.

List Items.Item 2: Wire Transfers within the SEPA region

Section 5.Title: Request money with ease
Section 5.Description: No more fuss-just send a link, and get paid quickly and effortlessly from anyone, anywhere in the world.

Section 7.Title: Time to go digital
Section 7.Description: Manage your finances effortlessly with our intuitive mobile app. From account management to fund transfers and upcoming budget tracking, MyMonty offers a user-friendly interface tailored to your needs. Choose between EUR or GBP for seamless transactions in your preferred currency.

Section 8.Title: Get a look at our revolutionary features

Features.Title: Streamlined contactless payments
Features.Description: Enjoy the convenience of contactless payments with MyMonty EEA/UK's integration with Google Pay. Securely make purchases in-store, online, and at payment terminals with ease and speed.

Features.Title: Support around the clock
Features.Description: Count on MyMonty for reliable customer support. Our dedicated team is available during business hours, backed by an in-app bot for 24/7 assistance. Whether you have questions or need help, we're here to ensure your experience is smooth and enjoyable.

Section 9.Title: Choose your plan
Section 9.Description: We've got you covered with plans tailored to your needs. Just pick the one that suits you best or compare plans.

Plans.Title: Starter
Plans.Description:
Looking to start that journey to financial freedom?
Get our Starter plan and enjoy true freedom with low in-store fees and a virtual/physical card.

Plans.Title: Plus
Plans.Description: If you're looking for true value, try our Classic plan with zero card fees, zero monthly charges and more.

Plans.Title: Premium
Plans.Description: Step up to a truly global level. Enjoy multi-currency features and added value such as investment, health and much more.

Seo.Title: Innovative Financial Solutions
Seo.Description: Send, receive & request money anytime anywhere. Transfer money globally. Easily manage your money. Biometric protection
Seo.Og Description: Send, receive & request money anytime anywhere. Transfer money globally. Easily manage your money. Biometric protection
Seo.Twitter Description: Send, receive & request money anytime anywhere. Transfer money globally. Easily manage your money. Biometric protection

Banner.Title: See what sets us apart
Banner.Description: At MyMonty, we're committed to making basic payment services a universal right. We empower you to effortlessly send, receive, or request money with transparent pricing and no hidden fees.

Cards.Title: Effortless onboarding
Cards.Description: Joining us is as smooth as it gets! Our streamlined registration process swiftly provides you with an International Bank Account Number (IBAN) after our user-friendly vetting process.

Cards.Title: Recurring payments
Cards.Description: No more stressing over recurring payments when you can set them up automatically. Sit back and relax while we handle your utility bills promptly, ensuring you never miss a deadline.

Cards.Title: No surprise fees
Cards.Description: Send, receive and request payments globally with no hidden fees, only transparency.

Cards.Title: Here for you
Cards.Description: Our friendly customer service team is available Monday to Friday, from 9:00 am to 5:00 pm (EEST).

Cards.Title: High-end security
Cards.Description: No need to remember passwords. Utilize biometric protection to safeguard your account against hackers. Just use your face to lock down your transactions securely.

Seo.Title: Financial Services and Features
Seo.Description: Manage your accounts and recurring payments with high-end security (biometric protection). Enjoy our friendly support.
Seo.Og Description: Manage your accounts and recurring payments with high-end security (biometric protection). Enjoy our friendly support.
Seo.Twitter Description: Manage your accounts and recurring payments with high-end security (biometric protection). Enjoy our friendly support.

Banner.Title: One app for all things money
Banner.Description: Manage your money effortlessly from the comfort of one single intuitive app.
Banner.Image Alt: One app for all things money

Section 2.Title: Who We Are
Section 2.Description: At MyMonty EEA/UK, we're all about simplifying financial processes. Our digital platform offers innovative, user-friendly financial services to individuals across the EEA and UK. We're all about making finance easy, secure, and accessible for everyone, especially the unbanked, underbanked, and youth, so they can enjoy personalized financial solutions.

Cards.Title: This is the future
Cards.Description: Once a luxury, basic financial services have become a right for everyone, in a world where digital is the new norm.

Section 3.Title: Equal opportunities for all
Section 3.Description: At MyMonty, we believe in leveling the playing field. Whether you're a tech enthusiast, an underserved individual, or a starter in financial services, we're here to serve you.

Section 4.Title: Digital all the way
Section 4.Description: Digital is at the heart of our operations. With MyMonty, you can effortlessly send, receive, and request funds with a single tap. Experience the ease of contactless transactions and embrace a seamless digital future with us!

Section 5.Title: Our culture: building on diversity
Section 5.Description: Our strength lies in our dedicated, agile, and diverse team. Together, we're committed to pushing boundaries in digital innovation, ensuring your journey towards a simpler and more connected future.

Section 6.Title: Our offices
Section 6.Description: Our strength lies in our dedicated, agile, and diverse team. Together, we're committed to pushing boundaries in digital innovation, ensuring your journey towards a simpler and more connected future.

Banner.Title: Unlock the best of what we offer
Banner.Description: Enjoy our outstanding features and stand out from the crowd
Banner.Image Alt: Unlock the best of what we offer

Section 2.Title: Features
Section 2.Description: Experience the convenience of features tailored just for you

Cards.Title: Wallet Account
Cards.Excerpt: Experience seamless transacting with MyMonty Europe's digital Wallet AccountDiscover a new era of financial convenience with MyMonty Europe's user-friendly mobile app. Our intuitive platform offers a comprehensive suite of payment services, from account management and fund transfers
Cards.Description:
Experience seamless transacting with MyMonty Europe's digital Wallet Account

Discover a new era of financial convenience with MyMonty Europe's user-friendly mobile app. Our intuitive platform offers a comprehensive suite of payment services, from account management and fund transfers, all accessible on-the-go.
Enjoy the flexibility of our single-currency wallet account, available in EUR or GBP, and make quick, secure transactions with our contactless payment solutions through Google Pay.

Top-up by card

Easily top-up your MyMonty wallet by securely saving your Mastercard or Visa cards. Enjoy instant access to your funds with every top-up. Fees for this service can be configured based on your personalized pricing plan, ensuring flexibility and convenience tailored to your needs.

Top up by P2P request

Easily request funds from friends or family and instantly top up your balance with just a few taps.

Top up by SEPA transfer

Conveniently add funds to your account via a secure and straightforward SEPA bank transfer.

Cards.Title: Virtual Cards
Cards.Excerpt: Effortless Control with MyMonty Virtual CardsWith MyMonty's Issuing type wallet, you can effortlessly manage your finances by issuing virtual cards directly from our user interface. Simply navigate to the Cards tab and select the option to issue a Virtual card, which will be instantly available for use
Cards.Description:
Effortless control with MyMonty Virtual Cards

With MyMonty's Issuing type wallet, you can effortlessly manage your finances by issuing virtual cards directly from our user interface. Simply navigate to the Cards tab and select the option to issue a Virtual card, which will be instantly available for use.

Once issued, you can

  • View card details by clicking the See details button and authenticating yourself

  • Freeze the card

  • Destroy the card (only after it has been frozen)

  • Add the card to Apple or Google Pay

If a virtual card is destroyed, you can request a new one at any time. To ensure you never miss an expiry date, you'll receive a push notification reminding you when your card's validity is about to end, allowing you to renew it easily by navigating to the card and clicking the Renew button.

Embrace the convenience and security of MyMonty virtual cards, designed to give you full control over your digital transactions.

Cards.Title: Physical Cards
Cards.Excerpt: Effortless Issuance and Management of Physical CardsFor the Issuing type wallet, physical cards can be requested easily, similar to virtual cards. Navigate to the Physical Card screen in the Cards tab, ensure you are KYC-verified and have a non-zero balance, then click “Order card”
Cards.Description:
Effortless issuance and management of Physical Cards

For the Issuing type wallet, physical cards can be requested easily, similar to virtual cards. Navigate to the Physical Card screen in the Cards tab, ensure you are KYC-verified and have a non-zero balance, then click “Order card”. Enter your delivery details and set your PIN in a few quick steps.

Users are limited to one physical and one virtual card at a time. Once confirmed, your card will be on its way. Activate it upon receipt via the app.

With an activated physical card, you can:

  • View card details by clicking the See details button and authenticating yourself

  • Freeze the card

  • Add the card to Apple or Google Pay.

Destroyed physical cards can be reordered, with fees deducted immediately. Cards are sent via RoyalMail without tracking. As expiration nears, you'll receive a push notification, and can reissue the card by following the same process as a new order. Delivery fees apply.

Cards.Title: Wire Transfers: SEPA
Cards.Excerpt: Receive Wire Transfers with EaseRegister now and get your own unique IBAN, allowing you to start receiving wire transfers effortlessly. MyMonty supports EUR SEPA transfers (Single Euro Payment Area) and BGN BISERA inbound transfers, ensuring a smooth and secure transfer experience
Cards.Description:
Receive wire transfers with ease

Register now and get your own unique IBAN, allowing you to start receiving wire transfers effortlessly. MyMonty supports EUR SEPA transfers (Single Euro Payment Area) and BGN BISERA inbound transfers, ensuring a smooth and secure transfer experience.

Send wire transfers

Easily send outbound wire transfers to recipients matching your currency. Customize fees for IBAN transfers based on your selected plan. Save recipient details like names, IBANs, and aliases for quick future transfers. MyMonty supports EUR SEPA, BGN BISERA outbound transfers, and GBP Faster Payments for efficient transactions.

Cards.Title: Peer to Peer Transfers
Cards.Excerpt: Instant P2P TransfersEasily transfer funds to other users within your MyMonty wallet instantly. If the recipient is not yet registered, they will receive an SMS invitation. Once they register and complete KYC verification, the transfer will be processed and credited to their account
Cards.Description:
Instant P2P transfers

Easily transfer funds to other users within your MyMonty wallet instantly. If the recipient is not yet registered, they will receive an SMS invitation. Once they register and complete KYC verification, the transfer will be processed and credited to their account. P2P transfers expire after three days if not completed.
Additionally, P2P transfers can be configured to work between MyMonty and other Paynetics partners, such as Phyre, A1 Wallet, Pay by Vivacom, and BACB Pay.

Send money instantly

Easily send money to friends and family within the MyMonty wallet. If the recipient isn't registered, they'll receive an SMS invitation to join. Transfers are instant once they complete registration and KYC verification.

Receive funds effortless

Start receiving funds immediately with your unique IBAN. MyMonty supports EUR SEPA and BGN BISERA transfers, ensuring a smooth and secure experience. Funds are credited instantly to your account.

Request money conveniently

Request money from any contact with MyMonty's app. Non-users receive an SMS invite to join. Once they register and complete KYC, they can send you the requested amount instantly. Requests expire after three days if not processed.

Cards.Title: Google Pay
Cards.Excerpt: Streamlined Mobile PaymentsExperience seamless transactions with MyMonty through Google Pay. Effortlessly make secure payments in-store, online, and on-the-go
Cards.Description:
Streamlined mobile payments

Experience seamless transactions with MyMonty through Google Pay. Effortlessly make secure payments in-store, online, and on-the-go.

Cards.Title: Qr P2P Payments
Cards.Excerpt: Instant Transactions, Just Scan and PayUnlock the power of QR Payments for quick, hassle-free peer-to-peer transactions. Simply scan, enter the amount, and authorize the transaction in seconds
Cards.Description:
Instant transactions, just scan and pay

Unlock the power of QR Payments for quick, hassle-free peer-to-peer transactions. Simply scan, enter the amount, and authorize the transaction in seconds.

Cards.Title: Payment Link
Cards.Excerpt: Effortless Transactions at Your FingertipsRequest or accept payments with ease using MyMonty's Payment Link feature. Share personalized payment links for fast and convenient transactions anytime, anywhere
Cards.Description:
Effortless transactions at your fingertips

Request or accept payments with ease using MyMonty's Payment Link feature. Share personalized payment links for fast and convenient transactions anytime, anywhere.

Seo.Title: Explore Digital Banking Features
Seo.Description: Read more about MyMonty's virtual cards to manage your finances effortlessly. Enjoy our outstanding features and stand out from the crowd.
Seo.Og Description: Read more about MyMonty's virtual cards to manage your finances effortlessly. Enjoy our outstanding features and stand out from the crowd.
Seo.Twitter Description: Read more about MyMonty's virtual cards to manage your finances effortlessly. Enjoy our outstanding features and stand out from the crowd.

Banner.Title: Frequently asked questions
Banner.Description: Our team is always ready to assist you or answer your inquiries. Fill out this form to reach us.

Cards.Question: How to use MyMonty on a new device?
Cards.Answer: When attempting to sign in on a new device, an OTP (One-Time Password) will be sent to the mobile device associated with the registered mobile number. Once the OTP is entered correctly, input your PIN to complete the login process. An email will also be sent to the registered email address to confirm the new login.

Cards.Question: What are the benefits of choosing the Starter plan?
Cards.Answer:
You can explore our plans page for more details about our offerings. The Starter plan includes:
  • Dedicated individual Euro IBAN
  • MyMonty virtual debit card
  • MyMonty contactless physical card
  • Enhanced data security & privacy
  • Customer support
  • P2P money transfer
  • Global ATM withdrawals

Cards.Question: What are the current plans available at MyMonty?
Cards.Answer: Currently, we offer a Free Starter account to our customers, which provides all the essential features to ensure your experience with MyMonty is comfortable.

Cards.Question: How to find your IBAN details
Cards.Answer: To locate your IBAN, navigate to “Profile,” tap on your name, and then select the “Personal IBAN” option.

Cards.Question: Are my deposits insured with MyMonty?
Cards.Answer: Yes, each deposit in your IBAN is insured by FSCS for up to €100,000.

Cards.Question: What is IBAN?
Cards.Answer: An IBAN is a unique code used to identify a specific bank account for cross-border payments. Knowing your beneficiary's IBAN ensures that your international payments reach their destination securely.

Cards.Question: Why do I need to connect my email?
Cards.Answer: Connecting your email adds an extra layer of security to your account. An OTP will be sent to your provided email address. Please enter the OTP in the designated field and tap 'Verify.'

Cards.Question: Which countries are eligible to open accounts with MyMonty?
Cards.Answer:
We currently provide services within the European Economic Area (EEA).
The EEA includes Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Republic of Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.

Cards.Question: How long will the KYC check take?
Cards.Answer: After you submit your KYC documents, we will review your application. Please note that the verification process may take up to 3 hours during a working day.

Cards.Question: How is the KYC process done at MyMonty?
Cards.Answer: Upon submitting your verification documents, a liveness check is conducted. Smile for the camera and snap a selfie. The final step involves verifying your home address. Please upload a utility bill dated no more than 3 months from today's date.

Cards.Question: What is KYC?
Cards.Answer: KYC, or Know Your Customer, is a standard practice where companies verify the identity of their clients to comply with legal requirements and regulations. In the digital age, KYC helps prevent online fraud and meets global financial standards.

Cards.Question: What are the required documents to onboard?
Cards.Answer:
To onboard on our platform, please upload one of the following official documents for the KYC/AML check:
  • Passport
  • Driving License
  • ID Card
  • Proof of Address such as utility bill

Cards.Question: How to create an account in MyMonty?
Cards.Answer:
To create an account, follow these steps:
  • Download the MyMonty app from the Apple Store or Google Pay, or access it via our web app. (Link doesn't work)
  • Enter your phone number.
  • Enter the 6-digit code received via SMS on your mobile device.
  • Follow the instructions to verify your identity.

Cards.Question: Why am I asked to verify my payment when sending money?
Cards.Answer: Verification ensures that the payment request is authorized by you, the account holder.

Cards.Question: How do I send money to someone’s bank account?
Cards.Answer:
• Tap the “Transfer” quick icon on the main page.
  • Swipe to the “IBAN Transfer” tab.
  • Choose the recipient from the list or tap “New Recipient”.
  • Enter the recipient's banking details (Recipient, Currency, IBAN…) and tap Next.
  • Enter the amount and an optional description, then tap Transfer.

Important: Currently supports EUR SEPA transfers and BGN BISERA outbound transfers. You can save recipients for faster transactions in the future.

Cards.Question: How do I send money to another MyMonty user?
Cards.Answer:
• Tap the “Transfer” quick icon on the main page.
  • Select the recipient's name from the list (ensure the MyMonty logo appears next to their name).
  • Enter the amount and tap “send”.

Cards.Question: Where can I share the payment link?
Cards.Answer: Simply tap the "QR Code" quick icon, swipe to the "My QR Code" tab, set the desired amount, and generate the QR code along with a payment link. Tap “Share Link” to send it via any messaging app on your mobile device. Once clicked by another MyMonty user, the requested money will be sent directly to your account.

Cards.Question: How can someone send me money via QR code?
Cards.Answer: Tap the "QR Code" quick icon, swipe to the "My QR Code" tab, set the desired amount, and generate the QR code. When another MyMonty user scans it, the requested money will be sent directly to your account.

Cards.Question: How can I review my past transactions?
Cards.Answer: Your balance updates automatically after each transaction. View all past transactions under “Payment History” on the mobile app homepage.

Cards.Question: What are the transfer limits within MyMonty?
Cards.Answer:
Here are the transfer limits you should be aware of:
  • Single Outgoing transfer - €3,000
  • Outgoing transfer per 24 hours - €5,100
  • Outgoing transfer per 7 days - €15,000
  • Outgoing transfer per 30 days - €30,000
  • Outgoing transfer per year - €100,000
  • Total of incoming or outgoing transfers per month - €50,000
  • Total of incoming or outgoing transfers per year - €180,000
  • Transfer to IBAN top-up not exceeding €51,300 per month
  • Credit/Debit card top-up not exceeding €30,700 per month
  • Maximum account balance - €180,000

Please note that there is no limit on the number of P2P transfers.

Cards.Question: What are the transactional fees?
Cards.Answer:
• Top-up fee: The first top-up is free, and a 1.5% fee is charged thereafter.
  • ATM withdrawal within SEPA region (EUR): 1.5% fee with a minimum of €1.
  • ATM withdrawal internationally: 2% fee with a minimum of €2.
  • ATM balance inquiry/PIN change: Free of charge.
  • Transaction decline/return fee: Free of charge.
  • POS domestic transactions: Free of charge.
  • POS international transactions: Free of charge, plus merchant fees if applicable (FX passthrough).
  • SEPA Transfer fee: €0.15.
  • Faster Payments: €0.2

Cards.Question: How can I withdraw cash from my account?
Cards.Answer:
You can withdraw money globally from any ATM that accepts MasterCard.
Important tips:
  • ATM and FX fees may apply when withdrawing money.
  • We recommend withdrawing in the local currency of the country you're in.
  • Please note any applied ATM fees.
  • Opt to withdraw "without conversion" to be charged in the local currency. For example, if you're in Poland, withdraw in Zloty (zł).
  • Choosing "with conversion" may result in additional fees due to the bank's exchange rate.

Cards.Question: Why am I asked to set a PIN during the onboarding?
Cards.Answer: Your PIN is essential to safeguard your account from unauthorized access.

Cards.Question: How can I deactivate my MyMonty account?
Cards.Answer: To deactivate your account, simply refrain from using it. After a period of inactivity, your account status will change to dormant.

Cards.Question: Can I change my name and number after onboarding?
Cards.Answer: For security reasons, the name and phone number provided during onboarding cannot be changed.

Cards.Question: How can I change my personal details?
Cards.Answer: You can update your email address and occupation anytime within the app. Navigate to the “Profile” tab, select your name, and then tap on “Personal Details”.

Cards.Question: How do i change my PIN?
Cards.Answer:
To change your PIN, follow these steps:
  • Log out of your account if you haven’t already done so and close the app completely.
  • Open the MyMonty app and enter your phone number.
  • When prompted, enter your current PIN code. On the same screen, locate the "Forgot PIN" option in the lower left corner.
  • Select "Forgot PIN" and follow the prompts to enter and confirm your new PIN.
  • You will be asked to send a selfie holding your ID card to one of our associates via chat.
  • Ensure your face and the name and photo on the ID card are clearly visible in the photo. Obscure any other information on the ID card.
  • Please note that photos that do not meet these requirements will not be accepted, and your PIN change request may not be approved.

Cards.Question: What if I lost or damaged my phone?
Cards.Answer:
If you lose or damage your phone, don't worry! Your MyMonty account remains accessible without your phone. You can continue using all services.
To regain access:
  • Download the MyMonty app on your new phone.
  • Enter your phone number and follow the steps to receive an OTP verification code.
  • Enter your 4-digit PIN to log in and resume using your MyMonty account seamlessly.

Cards.Question: What are the controls accessible by the user after physical card activation?
Cards.Answer:
Once your physical card is activated, you have access to the following controls:
  • View card details: Click the "See details" button and authenticate yourself to view your card's details.
  • View card PIN: Click the "View PIN" button and authenticate yourself to view your card's PIN.
  • Freeze the card: Click the "Freeze card" button to temporarily deactivate your card.
  • Destroy the card: Click the "Destroy card" button to permanently deactivate and discard your card.
  • Add to Apple or Google Pay: If in-app provisioning is enabled, you can add your card to Google Pay or manually for Apple Pay for convenient mobile payments.

Cards.Question: What happens if the card has expired before the account balance is exhausted?
Cards.Answer:
If your physical card is approaching its expiration date, you can initiate a reissue by selecting the card and clicking on the "Reissue" button. To ensure you don't miss the expiration, we'll send you a push notification alerting you that your card's validity is ending soon.
The reissue process involves selecting a delivery address and PIN, similar to ordering a new card. Please note that card delivery fees apply. Your existing balance will be transferred to the new card once issued.

Cards.Question: What if I find the reported lost card?
Cards.Answer: If you recover a card that you previously reported lost or stolen, please ensure to immediately destroy the found card by cutting it in half through the magnetic stripe and chip.

Cards.Question: What happens if my card gets stuck in the ATM?
Cards.Answer: If your card is retained by an ATM, please freeze and destroy it using the app, then request a replacement card.

Cards.Question: How can I change my card PIN?
Cards.Answer: To change your PIN, visit any ATM that offers PIN change services for Mastercard. Follow the instructions displayed on the ATM screen for changing your PIN.

Cards.Question: When does my card expires?
Cards.Answer: Your card displays an expiry date (the "Expiry Date") on it. After this date, your card and any linked bank account will no longer be usable. However, you can still receive and send funds to and from the account associated with the card.

Cards.Question: How can I order a physical card?
Cards.Answer:
Ordering a physical card follows a process similar to virtual cards:
  • Navigate to the "Physical Cards" section in the Cards tab.
  • Ensure you have completed KYC verification and have a non-zero balance.
  • Tap on "Order Card" to begin.
  • Start by entering the delivery details for the card.
  • Proceed through two screens to choose and confirm your card PIN.
  • Once you've entered the address and confirmed the PIN, review your details and confirm to initiate delivery of your card.

Cards.Question: What are Virtual Cards?
Cards.Answer: Virtual cards function similarly to physical cards but are exclusively used within the app. Once activated, they can be used immediately for online payments, contactless ATM withdrawals, and transactions at any contactless POS.

Cards.Question: How do I get my card PIN?
Cards.Answer:
To retrieve your card PIN:
  • Navigate to the "Cards" tab in your app.
  • Swipe to select the card for which you want to view the PIN.
  • Tap on "Show PIN". Your PIN will be displayed in no time.

Cards.Question: What is a card PIN?
Cards.Answer: A Personal Identification Number (PIN) is required for withdrawing money from ATMs or making payments at card terminals.

Cards.Question: Can a minor have an independent MyMonty card?
Cards.Answer: Only individuals aged 18 and above are eligible to use our payment services and onboard independently.

Cards.Question: Can I overdraft my account?
Cards.Answer: Our payment services are prepaid and not credit-based. You must maintain a sufficient Available Balance to cover your transactions and associated fees. If for any reason a transaction exceeds your Available Balance and is processed, you must promptly repay the exceeded amount, and we may restrict future transactions.

Cards.Question: Do I get any interest on my account?
Cards.Answer: No, the Available Balance in your card or account does not accrue interest.

Cards.Question: Are there any exchange fees when using the MyMonty card?
Cards.Answer: Transactions made in a currency other than your card's denomination will incur fees at the current exchange rate.

Cards.Question: Are my payment services instantly activated?
Cards.Answer: Your payment services may not be activated instantly until we verify your identity and meet all applicable regulatory requirements. We maintain records of this information as required by law.

Cards.Question: How can I top up my card?
Cards.Answer:
You can add funds to your MyMonty debit card using the following methods:
  • An external credit or debit card*
  • SEPA

*Please ensure that the bank card is issued in your name.

Cards.Question: What if I lost or damaged physical card
Cards.Answer:
If your physical card is lost or damaged, please follow these steps to freeze it immediately:
  • Tap on the card widget on your home screen
  • Swipe to select the card you wish to stop
  • Turn on the "Freeze card" toggle

Cards.Question: Where will the card be sent?
Cards.Answer:
The replacement card will be mailed to the most recent address registered on your account.
PS: Please ensure the address provided is accurate to avoid a card replacement fee. We will contact you the day before delivery

Cards.Question: How do I reorder the physical / virtual card?
Cards.Answer:
You can easily replace your card if it's damaged or expired:
  • Open the MyMonty app
  • Navigate to the card tab
  • Freeze the card by tapping the "Freeze" card toggle
  • Tap on the "Destroy card" link that appears once the card is frozen.

Once destroyed, you can reorder physical/virtual cards. A delivery fee will apply again for the physical card.

Cards.Question: Are there any delivery fees for my physical card?
Cards.Answer: Yes, there is a €5 delivery fee to cover the cost of delivering your card.

Cards.Question: What are the card transactional fees?
Cards.Answer:
• Top-up fee: The first top-up is free, and a 1.5% fee applies thereafter.
  • ATM withdrawal/SEPA region (Eur): 1.5% fee with a minimum of 1€.
  • ATM withdrawal/international: 2% fee with a minimum of 2€.
  • ATM balance inquiry/PIN change: Free.
  • Transaction decline/return fee: Free.
  • POS domestic: Free.
  • POS international/transaction: Free, plus applicable merchant fees (FX passthrough).
  • Delivery fee: 5€.
  • Replacement fee: 2€.

Cards.Question: What are the Card Transaction limits?
Cards.Answer:
• Single Payment POS: €5,000.
  • Single ATM Transaction: €200.
  • Single Top-up: €5,000.

Transaction limits per 24 hours:
  • POS transactions: €10,000 or 50 payments at POS for digitized or virtual cards; 20 payments at POS for physical card.
  • ATM transactions: €1,000 or 5 ATM withdrawals.
  • Top-up transactions: €10,000 or 50 top-ups.

Transaction limits per 7 days:
  • POS transactions: €15,000 or 120 payments at POS for all card types.
  • ATM transactions: €4,000 or 35 ATM withdrawals.
  • Top-up transactions: €15,000 or 100 top-ups.

Transaction limits per 30 days:
  • POS transactions: €30,000 or 300 payments at POS for all card types.
  • ATM transactions: €10,000 or 90 ATM withdrawals.
  • Top-up transactions: €30,000 or 300 top-ups.

Banner.Title: Our code of conduct
Banner.Description: Learn about the guiding principles at MyMonty.

Cards.Title: Equality
Cards.Description: We believe in providing equal opportunities and rights to everyone, ensuring fairness and inclusivity in all our endeavors.

Cards.Title: Inclusivity
Cards.Description: No one is left behind. We strive to include and empower individuals from all walks of life, regardless of their background or circumstances.

Cards.Title: Integrity
Cards.Description: Our actions are guided by honesty, transparency, and loyalty. We uphold the highest ethical standards in all our interactions.

Cards.Title: Excellence
Cards.Description: We are dedicated to delivering exceptional quality in everything we offer, striving for excellence in service and innovation.

Cards.Title: Commitment
Cards.Description: True to our core values, we are unwavering in our dedication to serving our customers, partners, and communities with passion and integrity.

Cards.Title: Professionalism
Cards.Description: Operating with efficiency and responsibility, we uphold professional standards to ensure the trust and confidence of all those we serve.

Cards.Title: Compliance & Legal Responsibility
Cards.Description: We adhere strictly to all applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards. Compliance is non-negotiable in our commitment to responsible financial practices.

Cards.Title: Confidentiality & Data Protection
Cards.Description: We safeguard customer information with the utmost care and confidentiality. Data protection and privacy are fundamental principles in our operations.

Cards.Title: Customer Focus
Cards.Description: We prioritize the needs and interests of our customers, striving to deliver exceptional service and innovative solutions that enhance their financial well-being.

Banner.Title: Join our dream team
Banner.Description: Don't miss your chance! Check out our vacancies on LinkedIn now.

Section 2.Title: Embark on Your career journey with us
Section 2.Description:
Our team is our biggest asset! We are dedicated to recognizing and cultivating talent from within, offering a transparent and well-defined career path for our valuable team members.

We heavily invest in employee training programs, workshops, and mentorship initiatives, ensuring our team is not only well-equipped for their current roles but also ready for future challenges.

Banner.Title: Board of Directors
Banner.Description: We believe in our people. By continually supporting and elevating their skills, we set the bar high and keep pushing it higher. We're dedicated to coaching and empowering our team to redefine the digital payment experience.

Cards.Name: Mountasser Hachem
Cards.Bio: With over two decades of leadership in managing a group of holdings, Mr. Hachem is driven by a relentless pursuit to positively impact lives, even through risk-taking and exploring new sectors. Ambitious and bold, he founded Monty Group and its subsidiaries, delving into the telecommunications industry, where he has built a thriving career. His visionary approach has transformed the company into an international powerhouse with multiple branches worldwide.

Cards.Name: Randa Naboulsi
Cards.Bio: Randa Naboulsi, an ambitious and results-oriented Chief Financial Officer, earned her BBA from the University of Balamand in Lebanon in 1995, followed by an MBA from the Lebanese American University of Beirut in 2008. With extensive hands-on experience in Corporate Finance, Treasury, Budgeting & Forecasting, she excels in cultivating strong investor relationships.

Cards.Name: Susanne Hannestad
Cards.Bio: With over 30 years of experience in Banking, Insurance, and Financial sectors, Mrs. Hannestad boasts a track record of successfully scaling and launching companies in global markets. Her extensive expertise provides a unique edge in fintech growth and development. Currently serving as a board member of Monty Mobile and MyMonty within Monty Group, she contributes valuable insights to the strategic development of both companies.

Cards.Name: Arvinder Gujral
Cards.Bio: Armed with an MBA in Business Management, Mr. Gujral was the first Twitter employee in India to rise to the role of Managing Director for Southeast Asia and Senior Business Development for APAC. With over 22 years of experience spanning Technology, Telecom, and Advertising, he has collaborated with major international players. Currently serving as a board member of MyMonty, the latest Fintech venture under Monty Group, he plays a pivotal role in expanding its digital footprint and market reach.

Cards.Name: Sarah Alateeqi
Cards.Bio: Mrs. Alateeqi serves as the Vice Chairman and Acting CEO of AlMal Investment Company in Kuwait, bringing extensive expertise as a business leader. Passionate about finance and investments, she has a diverse background that spans investment banking, private equity, and innovation consulting. Holding an MBA from the University of Chicago Booth, she has also worked in Kuwait and London, UK. As a board member of MyMonty, she plays a crucial role in advancing the company's growth strategy and financial innovation.

Cards.Name: Mike Quintanilla
Cards.Bio: Mr. Quintanilla currently serves as the Chief Innovation Officer at GenuBank in Reno, Nevada, USA, leveraging extensive expertise in cryptocurrency and data analytics. With over 15 years in Finance and Fintech, he is recognized as an expert in Fintech strategy and blockchain implementation, having developed and supervised systems across various companies. Recently joining MyMonty as a board member within Monty Group, Mr. Quintanilla brings valuable insights to drive business growth by applying his years of accumulated expertise.
